name: Force Orb
description: You hurl an orb of magical force at an enemy. It bursts against the target and throws off razor-sharp shards of force that cut nearby enemies to ribbons.
info: Encounter Arcane , Evocation , Force , Implement Standard Action Ranged 20
secondary_info: Encounter Arcane , Evocation , Force , Implement Free Action Area burst 1 centered on the primary target
secondary_target: Each enemy in the burst other than the primary target
